select wthdrw_reg_dtm , mem_cd , mem_cd_nm , id , wthdrw_rsn_nm , wthdrw_yn from( select m2.reg_dtm as wthdrw_reg_dtm-- 탈퇴일 , m1.mem_cd -- 회원 분류 , case when m1.mem_cd ='CO' then '일반' when m1.mem_cd='CP' then '부품사' when m1.mem_cd='CS' then '위원' else '' end as mem_cd_nm -- 회원 분류_nm , m1.id -- 아이디 , m1.wthdrw_yn , case when m2.wthdrw_rsn_cd = 'e' then m2.wthdrw_rsn_etc_nm else m2.wthdrw_rsn_cd end as wthdrw_rsn_nm -- TODO 양현우 else (select cd_nm from co_code_mst where cd m2.wthdrw_rsn_cd ) from co_mem_mst m1 inner join co_mem_wthdrw_dtl m2 on m1.mem_seq =m2.mem_seq ) as ma
order by ma.wthdrw_reg_dtm desc LIMIT #{firstIndex}, #{recordCountPerPage}

select count(*) from( select m2.reg_dtm as wthdrw_reg_dtm-- 탈퇴일 , m1.mem_cd -- 회원 분류 , case when m1.mem_cd ='CO' then '일반' when m1.mem_cd='CP' then '부품사' when m1.mem_cd='CS' then '위원' else '' end as mem_cd_nm -- 회원 분류_nm , m1.id -- 아이디 , m1.wthdrw_yn , case when m2.wthdrw_rsn_cd = 'e' then m2.wthdrw_rsn_etc_nm else m2.wthdrw_rsn_cd end as wthdrw_rsn_nm -- TODO 양현우 else (select cd_nm from co_code_mst where cd m2.wthdrw_rsn_cd ) from co_mem_mst m1 inner join co_mem_wthdrw_dtl m2 on m1.mem_seq =m2.mem_seq ) as ma

sql.where:
and ma.wthdrw_yn='N'
and ma.wthdrw_reg_dtm >= str_to_date(#{strtDt}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and ma.wthdrw_reg_dtm < date_add(str_to_date(#{endDt}, '%Y-%m-%d'), interval 1 day)
and (
ma.mem_cd = #{memCdList}
)
and ma.id like concat('%', #{q}, '%')
and ma.wthdrw_rsn_nm like concat('%', #{q}, '%')
